plugin.name: log4j-xml
plugin.author: Mingfai Ma
plugin.title: Allow configure log4j by Groovy/XML in Grails 1.1
plugin.description: \ - detect if a log4j.groovy exists in grails-app/conf, if yes, generate a log4j.xml - detect if a log4j.xml exists - set log4j.configuration system property to log4j.xml - store the log4j.xml as string - provide a log4j controller to display the log4j.xml in development enviroment
